title: Customer support WhatsApp bot with Google Docs knowledge base and Gemini AI

## Smart WhatsApp AI Assistant Using Google Docs

Help customers instantly on WhatsApp using a smart AI assistant that reads your company‚Äôs internal knowledge from a Google Doc in real time. Built for clubs, restaurants, agencies, or any business where clients ask questions based on a policy, FAQ, or services document.

# ‚öôÔ∏è How it works

- Users send free-form questions to your WhatsApp Business number (e.g. ‚ÄúWhat are the gym rules?‚Äù or ‚ÄúAre you open today?‚Äù)

- The bot automatically reads your company‚Äôs internal Google Doc (policy, schedule, etc.)

- It merges the document content with today‚Äôs date and the user‚Äôs question to craft a custom AI prompt

- The AI (Gemini or ChatGPT) then replies back on WhatsApp using natural, helpful language

- All conversations are logged to Google Sheets for reporting or audit

> üí°Bonus: The AI even understands dates inside the document and compares them to today‚Äôs date ‚Äî e.g. if your document says ‚ÄúClosed May 25 for 30 days,‚Äù it will say ‚ÄúWe're currently closed until June 24.

# üß∞ Set up steps

1. Connect your WhatsApp Cloud API account (Meta)

2. Add your Google account and grant access to the Doc containing your company info

3. Choose your AI model (ChatGPT/OpenAI or Gemini)

4. Paste your document ID into the Google Docs node



5. Connect your WhatsApp webhook to Meta (only takes 5 minutes)

6. Done ‚Äî start receiving and answering customer questions!

> üìÑ Works best with free-tier OpenAI/Gemini, Google Docs, and Meta's Cloud API (no phone required). Everything is modular, extensible, and low-code.

# üîÑ Customization Tips

* Change the Google Doc anytime to update answers ‚Äî no retraining needed

* Add your logo and business name in the AI agent‚Äôs ‚ÄúSystem Prompt‚Äù

* Add fallback routes like ‚ÄúEscalate to human‚Äù if the bot can't help

* Clone for multiple brands by duplicating the workflow and swapping in new docs
